content: *pretty crochet afghan in calming shades of blue yarnspirations * materials bernat berella 4 100 g/3 5 oz * discontinued * contrast a 5 balls rich periwinkle blue contrast b 3 balls true periwinkle blue contrast c 3 balls soft periwinkle blue *bernat satin may be substituted * size 6 mm u s j or 10 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge pattern 2-row repeat finish with fringe
